description:
If you live in Androscoggin County, Maine, or any of the surrounding areas, and you suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can turn to the attorneys at the Hardy Wolf & Downing law firm in Lewiston for the quality, effective and personalized representation you need to achieve the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve.

Originally established in 1976, the law firm has grown to include two offices in the state, each providing convenient access to the highest level of advocacy and support possible for those dealing with personal injury claims arising from motor vehicle accidents, construction accidents, dangerous property conditions and other preventable tragedies.

Regarded as one of the area's leading injury practices, Hardy Wolf & Downing has secured more than $200 million in settlements and awards for their plaintiff clients, and they promise to work closely with you to ensure they have done all they can to help you and your family during this difficult and uncertain time in your life.

By working with their law firm, you can rest assured that your case will be handled by a highly seasoned trial advocate who always has your best interests at heart, and they will never require a fee unless they win your case.

To find out more about how Hardy Wolf & Downing can best help you protect your rights and entitlements while fighting to achieve the justice you seek, you can contact their law office by phone or through their website to schedule a free initial consultation.
